channel.title: Cloud Solution Architects
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast where we talk to humans working on Cloud Technologies like Azure, about interesting Cloud projects and the human side behind working in this space.
channel.itunes:author: Anand Kumar R
channel.itunes:summary: this blog is aimed at super simplifying and providing clariy for azure (microsoft cloud) using the written language.
channel.description: Cloud Solution Architects podcasts brings you the wealth of wisdom from solution architects across the globe working on azure solving critical business problems and changing the world with azure. For more cloud solution architect podcast episodes, animated azure videos, and simplified how-to content articles please check out www.azuremonk.com.

item.title: #12 – Phil Coachman - Principal Cloud Solution Architect(Data Scientist)
item.itunes:author: {"name"=>"anand kumar r", "avatar"=>"/assets/images/anandpic.png", "bio"=>"sr cloud solution srchitect @ microsoft", "links"=>[{"label"=>"website", "icon"=>"fas fa-fw fa-link", "url"=>"https://www.azuremonk.com"}, {"label"=>"twitter", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-twitter-square", "url"=>"https://twitter.com/ranand12"}, {"label"=>"github", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-github", "url"=>"https://github.com/ranand12"}, {"label"=>"linkedin", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-linkedin", "url"=>"https://www.linkedin.com/in/ranand12"}]}
item.itunes:subtitle: azuremonk.com: #12 – Phil Coachman - Principal Cloud Solution Architect(Data Scientist)
item.itunes:summary: #12 – Phil Coachman – Principal Data scientist demystifies “Data Science”, the future of Data Science and a really cool ML project
item.description: #12 – Phil Coachman – Principal Data scientist demystifies “Data Science”, the future of Data Science and a really cool ML project If you are in the data science field or aspiring to be in the data science field you are going to love this episode. In this episode we talk with Phil Coachman who works as a Data Scientist/Principal Cloud Solution Architect in Microsoft. We talk about Phil’s journey starting with the Bing, Xbox and Windows 10 team to his current role. We also demystify “who a data scientist” really is and what it take to be one. We talk about a really interesting and cool Train derailment prevention project using AI, Machine Learning, IoT sensors and IOT edge which is currently in production and has been deployed to 4 continents. Phil also gives you 4 ways on how you can keep up and learn everything you need to know about Machine Learning Show Notes Available at http://localhost:4000/2020/02/01/ep12/.
item.itunes:keywords: technology, azure, azuremonk, podcast, datascience, artificial, intelligence

item.title: #11 – Thomas Maurer – Azure Hybrid using Stack & Arc
item.itunes:author: {"name"=>"anand kumar r", "avatar"=>"/assets/images/anandpic.png", "bio"=>"sr cloud solution srchitect @ microsoft", "links"=>[{"label"=>"website", "icon"=>"fas fa-fw fa-link", "url"=>"https://www.azuremonk.com"}, {"label"=>"twitter", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-twitter-square", "url"=>"https://twitter.com/ranand12"}, {"label"=>"github", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-github", "url"=>"https://github.com/ranand12"}, {"label"=>"linkedin", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-linkedin", "url"=>"https://www.linkedin.com/in/ranand12"}]}
item.itunes:subtitle: azuremonk.com: #11 – Thomas Maurer – Azure Hybrid using Stack & Arc
item.itunes:summary: #11 – Thomas Maurer – Azure Hybrid using Stack & Arc
item.description: #11 – Thomas Maurer – Azure Hybrid using Stack & Arc In this episode we talk with Thomas Maurer who works as a Cloud Advocate in Microsoft. We talk about how Azure Stack helped his customer realize the value of Azure even when there were compliance need for the data not to leave the customer’s datacenters. Tom talks about how he keeps himself up to date with everything that’s happening in the Cloud world and his e-commerce website too. Show Notes Available at http://localhost:4000/2020/01/14/ep11/.
item.itunes:keywords: technology, azure, azuremonk, podcast, azure stack, arc
